text: A colored pencil (Canadian and British English: coloured pencil), is an art tool. It is made of a narrow, colored core inside a wooden cylindrical case. Unlike graphite and charcoal pencils, colored pencils' cores are wax or oil- based and have different proportions of pigments, additives, and binding agents. ==Related pages== *Pencil *Art Category:Art Category:Writing tools
title: Colored pencil
